metadata.name: Suspicious Plink Port Forwarding
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious Plink tunnel port forwarding to a local port

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(device.desc) = lower('command-line ssh, telnet, and rlogin client') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -r ')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious Plink tunnel port forwarding to a local port

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrative activity using a remote port forwarding to a local port References: https://www.real-sec.com/2019/04/bypassing-network-restrictions-through-rdp-tunneling/, https://medium.com/@informationsecurity/remote-ssh-tunneling-with-plink-exe-7831072b3d7d
